<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cavalier's Banner](/Feats.aspx?ID=6287) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=542" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=727" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 192 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=244)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6286)

**Requirements**
You have pledged your service to a specific organization or ideal.

</column>

---

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies’ spirits. You and all allies in a 30-foot emanation from your mount gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) 1.
